description: Game-breaking PSF now includes upgraded animation, trading players & draft picks, league records, player season logs, and the ability to relive past games - watch game-winning drives and key plays! Realistic formations for all eras! Alternate uniforms!

name: Dimension Rift : Otaku Save The World
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Family Sharing
description: When anime characters break into the real world, chaos begins! The ultimate otaku and guardian of the anime world join forces to find "Edith" the magical pen that can fix everything! Follow an otaku boy saving the world like never seen in any anime before in Dimension Rift: Otaku Save The World!

name: Mulerun - Free Game
categories: Single-player;Multi-player;Co-op;Online Co-op;Game demo;Steam Achievements;Camera Comfort;Custom Volume Controls;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime
description: Start solo or in online co-op, with each player taking on different roles: brew master, getaway driver, shady negotiator, or air support pilot. You’ll need to cooperate (or yell at each other) as you dodge cops, complete ridiculous tasks, and climb the ranks of two very dangerous worlds...

name: Astrolite
categories: Single-player;Steam Achievements;Full controller support;Custom Volume Controls;Adjustable Difficulty;Playable without Timed Input;Save Anytime;Stereo Sound;Steam Cloud;Stats;Family Sharing
description: Destroy progressively more challenging asteroids in a fight against time- level up and become stronger as you survive. Spend hard earned Luna Coins outside of matches to gain permanent power-ups to be used in future games. Over 60 achievements for completionists.
